name: g_to_c
description: Tests whether the tool projects a genomic variant to a coding transcript variant

name: g_to_n
description: Tests whether the tool projects a genomic variant to a non-coding DNA variant

name: c_to_g
description: Tests whether the tool projects a coding transcript variant to a genomic variant

name: n_to_g
description: Tests whether the tool projects a non coding variant to a genomic variant

name: c_to_p
description: Tests whether the tool projects a coding transcript variant to a protein variant

name: c_to_n
description: Tests whether the tool projects a coding variant to a non-coding variant

name: n_to_c
description: Tests whether the tool projects a non-coding variant to a coding variant

name: g_to_c_delins
description: Tests whether the tool correctly project a genomic indel to a coding transcript

name: c_to_p_matching
description: Tests whether the tool projects a coding transcript variant to the correct protein variant when there are multiple protein accessions.

name: c_ins_to_dup_shift
description: Given incorrectly shifted input; parse, normalize and give the correctly 3 prime shifted output

name: c_del_multiple
description: Given incorrectly shifted input; parse, normalize and give the correctly 3 prime shifted output

name: g_ins
description: Given incorrectly shifted input; parse, normalize and give the correctly 3 prime shifted output

name: c_del_single_base
description: Given incorrectly shifted input; parse, normalize and give the correctly 3 prime shifted output

name: g_del
description: Given incorrectly shifted input; parse, normalize and give the correctly 3 prime shifted output

name: g_ins_to_dup
description: Tests whether the tool rewrites a genomic duplication that has been annotated as an insertion

name: c_ins_to_dup
description: Tests whether the tool rewrites a coding transcript duplication annotated as an insertion

name: allow_3_letter_aa
description: Tests whether the tool rewrites a 1 letter protein variant with 3 letter amino acid codes
